headline: Exclusive-Comcast plans to cut jobs at its biggest unit, housing broadband and pay TV, to centralize operations, source says
summary: Comcast is planning to cut jobs at its biggest unit that houses its Xfinity internet, mobile and pay television business, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday, as the company attempts to centralize operations and bolster its broadband business.  Starting January, Comcast will remove a layer between the corporate and regional offices, a shake-up that will streamline the management of the unit but also reduce headcount.  The connectivity and platforms unit, which also operates the Sky brand across Europe, currently has a three-tier management structure where the regional teams report to division heads, who then serve as the link to corporate headquarters.

Starting January, Comcast will remove a layer between the corporate and regional offices, a shake-up that will streamline the management of the unit but also reduce headcount.  The connectivity and platforms unit, which also operates the Sky brand across Europe, currently has a three-tier management structure where the regional teams report to division heads, who then serve as the link to corporate headquarters.

headline: Comcast Opens New Xfinity Store in Canton, Georgia
summary: Comcast has opened the doors to its newest Xfinity Store in Canton, Georgia, highlighting the company's continued investment in expanding access to advanced technology and enhancing customer experience. The new store is located at 1449 Riverstone Parkway, Canton, GA 30114 and offers the complete suite of Xfinity services, including Xfinity Mobile.
